revised_title: On the Development and Morphology of Phylloglossum Drummondii: The Vegetative Organs
tldr: The author investigates the development and morphology of Phylloglossum Drummondii, focusing on the vegetative organs. They describe the structure of the tuber during the resting stage and the germination process, observing the formation of foliage leaves, roots, and new tubers. The study contributes to the understanding of Lycopodiaceae plant development and morphology.
